title: How to Make Maitre D'Hotel Butter

steps.headline: Pound the parsley and onion together in a mortar and pestle.
Season with the lemon juice and pepper to taste
Roll the butter between two sheets of waxed paper until it forms a cylinder shape.
Remove from the fridge when needed.
steps.description: Remove the paper and slice into discs. Place atop hot food and it will melt, forming a tasty sauce.

text: Pound the parsley and onion together in a mortar and pestle.  Mix in with the butter.  Season with the lemon juice and pepper to taste  Roll the butter between two sheets of waxed paper until it forms a cylinder shape.  Chill.  Remove from the fridge when needed. Remove the paper and slice into discs. Place atop hot food and it will melt, forming a tasty sauce.
